name: The Amethyst Gem
description:
In this game, you'll be playing as Azir. and trapped within the world inside of The Amethyst Gem. Your Mission is to get out from The World inside The Gem. You'll also encounter a friend (or foes) in your journey. this game also have 2 endings, the normal ending, and a secret ending.

This is my first ever RPG game. i hope you users enjoy my game. and if there's a problem in the game. let me know in the comment section.

Thanks for Playing 😊
